backend/main.mo: Main backend actor implementing user profiles, registrants, badges, and authorization-checked CRUD/query operations.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module adding a new userBadges map while preserving existing registrants and user profiles.
feature_evidence.json: Defines feature evidence entries mapping features to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing responsibilities of all major frontend files and hooks.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based theme definitions with warm OKLCH color variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes and wraps the app with AppLayout, ProfileSetupModal, and ThemeProvider.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Main layout with navigation, authentication UI, and user badge display handling both desktop and mobile.
frontend/src/components/AuthControls.tsx: Internet Identity sign‑in/out button with loading state and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal prompting new authenticated users to provide a display name before using the app.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUser.ts: Fetches the caller’s user profile, role, and admin status using the actor and exposes combined authentication state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, handling login, logout, stored identity loading, and AuthClient configuration.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Contains CRUD query and mutation hooks for user profiles and registrants using the backend actor with react-query caching.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserBadge.ts: Fetches or creates the current user’s badge via the backend actor with simple retry and caching rules.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light and dark theme variables and global styling rules.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point initializing React, react-query, Internet Identity provider, and global styles.
frontend/src/pages/DirectoryPage.tsx: Displays a searchable, filterable registrant directory with admin-only deletion and various loading and error states.
frontend/src/pages/EventsPage.tsx: Static events page outlining completed and upcoming steps with informational UI components.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Landing page with hero content, feature highlights, and buttons that adapt based on authentication state.
frontend/src/pages/RegistrationPage.tsx: Registration form that loads existing user data, validates inputs, and submits registrant info to the backend.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using search, hash, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme colors, typography, container settings, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing current features, requirements, and state of the ICP/Web3 onboarding app.
